# archestra_user_role_assignment (Resource)

Manages the assignment of a role to an Archestra user.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `role_identifier` (String) The ID of the role to assign
- `user_id` (String) The ID of the user to assign the role to

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Resource identifier (same as user_id)
